item.description:
**Time changed due to it being a Monday and train schedules are different than the weekend***

Join Ingo and me in our home for a fun and social evening of Wine and Cheese Tasting.

We'll purchase a selection of nice wines and interesting cheeses (and crackers) to taste. You bring yourselves and some interesting conversation.

I will ask each person to contibute $10 to help defray the cost of our purchases.
We can comfortably accomodate about 20 people.

Time: 6:30 pm - 9 pm Even if you can just come for a short time, still come!

Place: Our home in West Roxbury (bordering Brookline and Jamaica Plain).
***Note: I will provide the exact address and my phone number to those who RSVP.***

It's easy to get here from all over Boston - we're inside the 128 corridor. Also great for those in Boston not wanting to drive - we're just 1 block from the Commuter Rail Bellevue Station (13 minutes from Back Bay, 17 minutes from South Station)!

Want to take the Commuter Rail? Take the Needham Line to Bellevue Station. A train arrives here at 6:21pm which will get you here just in time. There are trains back to the city at 7:43 and 9:20

Hope to see you all there!

-Stacy and Ingo
item.name: *New Date* Wine and Cheese Tasting - early evening social
